org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.task

Class RestartServerTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.task.Task
      • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.task.RestartServerTask

  • public class RestartServerTask
extends Task
    The task called when we want to restart the server.

      • canLaunch

        public boolean canLaunch(Task taskToBeLaunched,
                         Collection<org.forgerock.i18n.LocalizableMessage> incompatibilityReasons)
        Description copied from class: Task
        Informs of whether the task to be launched can be launched or not. Every task must implement this method so that we avoid launching in paralel two tasks that are not compatible. Note that in general if the current task is not running this method will return true.
        Specified by:
        canLaunch in class Task
        Parameters:
        taskToBeLaunched - the Task that we are trying to launch.
        incompatibilityReasons - the list of incompatibility reasons that must be updated.
        Returns:
        true if the task that we are trying to launch can be launched in parallel with this task and false otherwise.
